stories.Title: Toyota steps up its game
stories.Description: The automaker's new roadmap focuses on developing four battery solutions to regain its industry leader status after facing challenges in the EV market.
stories.Tweet: Toyota steps up its game 📦 The automaker's new roadmap focuses on developing four battery solutions to regain its industry leader status after facing challenges in the EV market. #toyota https://arstechnica.com/cars/2023/09/toyota-reveals-its-plan-to-catch-up-on-ev-battery-technology/

stories.Title: Feel free to share the news
stories.Description: Tesla's referral program continues to improve. To enter the "Model 3 Performance Sweepstakes" and have a shot at winning a Model 3 Performance, you only need 1,000 credits.
stories.Tweet: Feel free to share the news 📦 Tesla's referral program continues to improve. To enter the "Model 3 Performance Sweepstakes" and have a shot at winning a Model 3 Performance, you only need 1,000 credits. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/09/20/tesla-adds-model-3-performance-giveaway-referral-program-boost-incentives/

stories.Title: Neuralink's next chapter
stories.Description: Elon Musk's neurotech startup is moving towards its first in-human clinical trial, aiming to restore communication for patients with degenerative diseases through brain-computer interfaces.
stories.Tweet: Neuralink's next chapter 📦 Elon Musk's neurotech startup is moving towards its first in-human clinical trial, aiming to restore communication for patients with degenerative diseases through brain-computer interfaces. #neuralink https://www.cnbc.com/2023/09/20/elon-musks-neuralink-is-recruiting-patients-for-its-first-human-trial.html

stories.Title: Human-robot cooperation
stories.Description: A team of scientists at Toyota's Research Institute has developed a new method that involves AI to enhance robot skill acquisition, with the aim of amplifying human capabilities through robotics.
stories.Tweet: Human-robot cooperation 📦 A team of scientists at Toyota's Research Institute has developed a new method that involves AI to enhance robot skill acquisition, with the aim of amplifying human capabilities through robotics. #toyota https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/toyota-conceives-of-more-efficient-method-to-train-robots

stories.Title: Long distance call
stories.Description: Space-based communication takes a big leap forward with AST Space Mobile's Blue Walker 3 satellite achieving the world's first 5G phone call from orbit to a remote location.
stories.Tweet: Long distance call 📦 Space-based communication takes a big leap forward with AST Space Mobile's Blue Walker 3 satellite achieving the world's first 5G phone call from orbit to a remote location. #space https://spacenews.com/ast-spacemobiles-prototype-satellite-makes-first-5g-connection/

stories.Title: Braving the sun's fury
stories.Description: NASA's Parker Solar Probe has ventured where no spacecraft has gone before and survived to share its story. It takes more than a powerful coronal mass ejection to deter the pursuit of knowledge.
stories.Tweet: Braving the sun's fury 📦 NASA's Parker Solar Probe has ventured where no spacecraft has gone before and survived to share its story. It takes more than a powerful coronal mass ejection to deter the pursuit of knowledge. #NASA https://mashable.com/article/sun-solar-ejection-nasa-footage

stories.Title: In the hands of experts
stories.Description: OpenAI's dedication to responsible AI development continues. The Red Teaming Network is their latest initiative that brings together experts to assess and mitigate AI model risks.
stories.Tweet: In the hands of experts 📦 OpenAI's dedication to responsible AI development continues. The Red Teaming Network is their latest initiative that brings together experts to assess and mitigate AI model risks. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/19/openai-launches-a-red-teaming-network-to-make-its-models-more-robust/

stories.Title: Enhancing medical diagnosis
stories.Description: AI is a key part of Google's plan to improve healthcare. The company is currently developing an Augmented Reality Microscope to simplify cancer detection and sample analysis.
stories.Tweet: Enhancing medical diagnosis 📦 AI is a key part of Google's plan to improve healthcare. The company is currently developing an Augmented Reality Microscope to simplify cancer detection and sample analysis. #google https://www.engadget.com/google-is-developing-an-ai-powered-microscope-to-help-doctors-spot-cancer-181507943.html

stories.Title: Breathe in, breathe out
stories.Description: Similar to anxiety before a test, Google's PaLM 2 demonstrates improved performance in solving math problems when prompted to "take a deep breath and work step by step."
stories.Tweet: Breathe in, breathe out 📦 Similar to anxiety before a test, Google's PaLM 2 demonstrates improved performance in solving math problems when prompted to "take a deep breath and work step by step." #ai https://www.businessinsider.com/ai-google-researchers-deepmind-tell-take-deep-breath-improve-accuracy-2023-9

stories.Title: All about cycles
stories.Description: There's a very useful feature coming for iPhone 15 and 15 Pro users. It provides essential battery insights, including details such as charge cycles, manufacturing date, and first-use date.
stories.Tweet: All about cycles 📦 There's a very useful feature coming for iPhone 15 and 15 Pro users. It provides essential battery insights, including details such as charge cycles, manufacturing date, and first-use date. #apple https://www.theverge.com/2023/9/20/23881952/apple-iphone-15-battery-charge-cycles-ios-17

title: Toyota's battery solutions, Neuralink moves to trials, PaLM 2's useful prompt
description: Toyota was caught by surprise by the ever-changing EV market; however, the automaker has a plan to show that it's not lagging behind. Elon Musk's Neuralink continues to push forward and is now looking for patients to try its revolutionary brain-computer interface. Lastly, AI is more like us than we think; they also need to take deep breaths before facing a math test.
